title: SPECIAL $300 off
posting_body: Modern, open-concept apartments and townhomes to choose from, Vargos on the Lake has the perfect one, two, or three bedroom apartments or townhomes for you and your pet.
Spacious floor plans feature custom upgrades like trendy kitchen backsplashes, custom framed mirrors, and USB charging outlets.
Each floor plan also includes an in-home washer, dryer, and extra linen closet storage for a touch of added convenience.
Call to schedule a tour today!
Reserve your home within 48 hours of your tour and receive $300 off your 1st full month's rent.
